using System;
using System.Collections.Generic;
using System.Linq;
using System.Text;
using System.Threading.Tasks;
using AsyncGenerator.TestCases;
using NUnit.Framework;

namespace AsyncGenerator.Tests.NUnit.Input
{
	public partial class AssertThat
	{
		public void TestAsync()
		{
#pragma warning disable NUnit2007
#pragma warning disable NUnit2009
			Assert.That(1, Is.EqualTo(1));
#pragma warning restore NUnit2009
#pragma warning restore NUnit2007

			Assert.That(async () =>
			{
				await (SimpleFile.ReadAsync());
				return true;
			}, Is.EqualTo(true));

			Assert.That(() =>
			{
				SimpleFile.Read();
				return true;
			});

			Assert.That(() =>
			{
				return SimpleFile.ReadAsync();
			}, Throws.Nothing);

			Assert.That(() =>
			{
				Console.WriteLine("");
			}, Throws.Nothing);

			var result = false;
			Assert.That(async () => result = await (SimpleFile.WriteAsync("")), Throws.Nothing);
			Assert.That<Task<bool>>(async () => result = await (SimpleFile.WriteAsync("")), Throws.Nothing);
			Assert.That(result, Is.True);

		}
	}
}
